INSERT INTO idols(no,name,height,weight,image, birth_date,group_no) VALUES(#{no},#{name},#{height}, #{weight}, #{image},#{birthDate},#{groupNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE idols SET name = #{name}, height = #{height}, weight = #{weight}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, group_no = #{groupNo} WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT no,name,height,weight, birth_date birthDate,image, group_no groupNo FROM idols WHERE group_no = #{no}

SELECT no,name,height,weight,birthDate, image, groupNo, groupName FROM(SELECT no,name,height,weight, image ,birthDate, groupNo, groupName, rownum r FROM(SELECT i.no no, i.name name, birth_date birthDate, height, weight, image, group_no groupNo, g.name groupName FROM idols i, groups g WHERE i.group_no = g.no ORDER BY 1 DESC)) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT i.no no, i.name name, birth_date birthDate, height, weight, group_no groupNo,image, g.name groupName FROM idols i, groups g WHERE i.group_no = g.no AND i.no = #{no}
